titleStmt.title: The discouerie of a gaping gulf vvhereinto England is like to be swallovved by another French mariage, if the Lord forbid not the banes, by letting her Maiestie see the sin and punishment thereof
titleStmt.author: Stubbes, John, 1543-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Singleton for W. Page],

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
